result.name: hse-resource-management-system
result.notes:
The Resource Management system holds the following information:

Information on current staff and former employees for the purposes of general, human resources and financial management.  These records include:

-	Personal contact details
-	Payroll records
-	Diversity information
-	Sickness and other absence history
-	Learning & development activity
-	Educational/professional qualifications
-	Appraisal records.
-	transactional data in relation to expenditure it has incurred with organisations for the provision of goods and services.(e.g. supplier details, value and date of transaction etc.)  
-	fees it has charged customers in relation to the provision of services. (e.g. customer details, amounts charged, amounts received etc.) 
-	contract opportunities with HSE worth more than £10,000, closed tender documentation, contract awards and contract documents are available on Contract Finder.  http://www.hse.gov.uk/sellingtohse/contracts.htm

The dataset includes personal and sensitive data under the provisions of the Data Protection Act.

A monthly-updated list of all financial transactions spending over £25,000 made by the Health and Safety Executive is published on http://data.gov.uk/dataset/financial-transactions-data-dwp-hse
as part of the Government's commitment to transparency in expenditure.

organization.name: health-and-safety-executive
organization.title: Health and Safety Executive
organization.description:
The Health and Safety Executive (HSE) is the national independent watchdog for work-related health, safety and illness. It acts in the public interest to reduce work-related death and serious injury across Great Britain’s workplaces.

HSE is an executive non-departmental public body of the Department for Work & Pensions

http://www.hse.gov.uk/

result.title: HSE Resource Management system

extras.value: Not due to be released Contains personal and sensitive data. Will be reviewed in the light of demand and prioritisation.
